htmlbody:
Summary

The Your Voice, Your Choice Ballot project ran in 2009. It was one of the Home Office community safety Participatory Budgeting (PB) pilots which was given £20,000 of Home Office funding for PB. Your Voice Your Choice used a postal vote, but did not solely rely on this.
